verses.verse: Now the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "There shall not <S%H376>any<s%> of us <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> as <S%H802>wife.<s%>"

The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1004>to<s%> <S%H430>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> there until <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voices,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H1419>severely.<s%>

They <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> why has this happened in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that there should be <S%H3117>today<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> <S%H6485>lacking<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>"

It happened on the next <S%H4283>day<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> rose <S%H7925>early,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> there an <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and peace <S%H5930>offerings.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Who is there among all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5927>didn't<s%> come up in the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%>" For they had made a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7621>oath<s%> concerning him who <S%H5927>didn't<s%> come up to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "He shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>"

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5162>grieved<s%> for <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> their <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "There is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> cut <S%H1438>off<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

How <S%H6213>shall<s%> we provide <S%H802>wives<s%> for those who <S%H3498>remain,<s%> since we have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> that we will not <S%H5414>give<s%> them of our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H802>wives?<s%>"

They <S%H559>said,<s%> "What <S%H259>one<s%> is there of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who <S%H5927>didn't<s%> come up to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpah?<s%>" <S%H935>Behold,<s%> there came <S%H376>none<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> from Jabesh <S%H3003>Gilead<s%> to the <S%H6951>assembly.<s%>
For when the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> <S%H376>behold,<s%> there were none of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of Jabesh Gilead <S%H3003>there.<s%>

The <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> there <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the most <S%H1121>valiant,<s%> and <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, <S%H3212>"Go<s%> and <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of Jabesh <S%H3003>Gilead<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> with the <S%H802>women<s%> and the little <S%H2945>ones.<s%>

This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that you shall <S%H6213>do:<s%> you shall utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> every <S%H2145>male,<s%> and every <S%H802>woman<s%> who has <S%H4904>lain<s%> with a <S%H3045>man.<s%>"

They <S%H4672>found<s%> among the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of Jabesh <S%H3003>Gilead<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H5291>young<s%> <S%H1330>virgins,<s%> who had not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> by <S%H4904>lying<s%> with <S%H2145>him;<s%> and they <S%H935>brought<s%> them to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> which is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

The whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> who were in the <S%H5553>rock<s%> of <S%H7417>Rimmon,<s%> and <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> peace to <S%H7965>them.<s%>

<S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> at that <S%H6256>time;<s%> and they <S%H5414>gave<s%> them the <S%H802>women<s%> whom they had saved <S%H2421>alive<s%> of the <S%H802>women<s%> of Jabesh <S%H3003>Gilead:<s%> and yet so they <S%H4672>weren't<s%> enough for them.
The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5162>grieved<s%> for <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> because that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H6556>breach<s%> in the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "How shall we <S%H6213>provide<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> for those who <S%H3498>remain,<s%> since the <S%H802>women<s%> are <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> out of <S%H1144>Benjamin?<s%>"

They <S%H559>said,<s%> "There must be an <S%H3425>inheritance<s%> for those who are <S%H6413>escaped<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> that a <S%H7626>tribe<s%> not be <S%H4229>blotted<s%> out from <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

However we <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H802>wives<s%> of our <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H779><s%> 'Cursed is he who <S%H5414>gives<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> to <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>'"

They <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2282>"Behold,<s%> there is a feast of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> from year to <S%H3117>year<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> which is on the <S%H6828>north<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> on the east <S%H6828>side<s%> of the <S%H4546>highway<s%> that goes <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and on the <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3829>Lebonah.<s%>"
They <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go<s%> and lie in <S%H693>wait<s%> in the <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%>

and <S%H7200>see,<s%> and <S%H1323>behold,<s%> if the daughters of <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H2342>dance<s%> in the <S%H4246>dances,<s%> then come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and each <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2414>catch<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

It shall <S%H1>be,<s%> when their fathers or their <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7378>complain<s%> to <S%H559>us,<s%> that we will say to <S%H2603>them,<s%> 'Grant them graciously to <S%H3947>us,<s%> because we didn't take for each <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> in <S%H4421>battle,<s%> neither did you <S%H5414>give<s%> them to <S%H6256>them,<s%> otherwise you would now be <S%H816>guilty.<s%>'"

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> did <S%H6213>so,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> them <S%H802>wives,<s%> according to their <S%H4557>number,<s%> of those who <S%H2342>danced,<s%> whom they <S%H1497>carried<s%> <S%H3212>off.<s%> They went and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and lived in <S%H3427>them.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>departed<s%> there at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7626>tribe<s%> and to his <S%H4940>family,<s%> and they went <S%H3318>out<s%> from there every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
In those <S%H3117>days<s%> there was no <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
